item.description:
****BEGINNING FRIDAY, MAY 21 THE RED SOX NATIVES WILL BE GATHERING AT SPLASH ON THE THIRD FRIDAY AND FIRST THURSDAY OF EACH MONTH THRU SEPTEMBER!****

We have arranged a special Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge for Red Sox Natives. This is an amazing venue with a plush lounge and one of Boston's best and largest roof decks with cabanas, complimentary hors d'oeuvres and billiards. A perfect place to hang out and enjoy a few drinks on a warm night, watch the Sox game at 7 pm or sit inside in our reserved section.

Join the Red Sox Natives and other groups for a Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge and Burger Bar from 5pm to 10pm on Friday, May 21 . This is one of Boston's newest hotspots.

This event includes up to 4 hours of complimentary food buffet and cash bar. (Prior nights have included marinated steak tips, assorted sliders, fresh pastas, spicy buffalo wings, king crab meat lollipops, salads, and crab cakes with menu items subject to change)

Admission is free for those who CLICK HERE TO RSVP to get added to the Guest List. Please follow these directions. Invite friends, guests, co-workers and groups.

Splash has a Dress Code: Dress to impress, no sneakers, t-shirts or hats.

Ask the hostess for The Red Sox Natives reserved section when checking in.

All Guests must be at least 21 plus with proper ID

Nearest MBTA stop is South Station or China Town.

Metered street parking is available in the area.

Valet parking is $20.00

http://www.splash-bos...

http://www.bostoneven...
item.name: Rush Hour at Splash Sponsored by Boston Event Guide for Red Sox Natives and....
